author: amaltaro
body:
Fixes https://github.com/dmwm/WMCore/issues/10983

Summary of changes is the following:
* bump py3-dbs3-client version to `4.0.6`
* make new patch release for WMAgent: `1.5.7.patch2`
* make new patch release for WMCore central services: `2.0.0.cmsweb1`
title: WMCore patch release 2.0.0.cmsweb1 and WMAgent 1.5.7.patch2; Bump dbs3-client to 4.0.6
